reviews.title: not worth price increase
reviews.review_text: price increase not worth it. the juice at best is average. i don't have skilling issues it's simply not worth the price point. it was 1.68 now it's over 3 dollars... will stick to the Aldi brand.

This juice is awful. my 15 year old granddaughter said its the worse she'ever tasted and thinks its because its GV brand, but we've had lots of store brand things that were as good, if not better than a name brand.. it takes metallic to me. I'm trying to refund, but for days, the site says its having problems. i have some other things I have to return before my date expires like it did on some other grocery orders. I don't drive ( whole reason for having delivery) and my husband is 86 and hates returning things, so I got stuck with around $30 of substituted items that were either not a good switch or something we wouldn't like. Some things cost more than what I ordered.,like my dogs Good nFun treatsĺ I just hope I can reach someone to return the $21 for3 pair underwear. I accidentally ordered. I wish they had a pick up for returns...that would sure help us old disabled people .

the orange juice is good...IF i could only break the seal on the cap! Please, make it easier for people who are not bodybuilders to be able to open your cap on the jugs of orange juice. This is ridiculous! I won't but anymore great value orange juice in a jug of i can't get it open. It is pointless to buy a product i can't get to even use unless a MAN is around to use all HIS strength to open it. It is your product... so fix it!

reviews.title: Spoiled Juice
reviews.review_text: Juice was ruined after less than a week. It tasted like straight acid. i will not be purchasing Great Value juice again. This is the second time it's happened.

reviews.title: Foamy “Fresh Orange Juice”.
reviews.review_text: This was a delivery on April 4, 2023. I opened the juice two days later on the actual date of expiration I noticed and the bottle was bloated and the contents foaming! I tried calling the online folks, no reply.. phone rang for a good minute and a half.

reviews.title: BAD JUICE
reviews.review_text: This OJ was dated AUG. 8th use by date. Yesterday which was the 18th of JULY, I took it from the refrigerator and the whole container was BULGING. I knew it was spoiled so I removed the cap to pour it out and it literally exploded like a volcano. Walmart is NOT holding refrigerated items correctly or this NEVER would have happened. BUYER BEWARE!!!!
Orange juice went bad long before expiration date wasn’t even opened Today is January 25th It was cold the whole time

reviews.title: Bad juice date
reviews.review_text: I purchased yesterday . The date said best used ny September 9th. Yesterday was the 25th I would like a refund please .

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.review_text: This is the worst "orange juice" we have ever tried. It tastes like it has gone bad long before it expires. I guess that's just how it tastes. I don't recommend trying it.

reviews.title: Expired Juice…
reviews.review_text: We purchased on the 12th of October and got around to drinking it the 19th. We didn’t think to check the date but upon trying it we noticed it was very sour and had an almost fizzy feel to it. My partner looked at the date today and it expired back in the middle of August… we are already battling sickness, which is the reason for the orange juice, and to see we had been drinking EXPIRED orange juice made me want to vomit. I’m not pleased at all. We definitely won’t be buying it again due to this bad experience..

reviews.title: Poor shopping. Poor packing? Unless bottle already
reviews.review_text: Both arrived with a freshness date that expired on the date of delivery. One was cracked and had leaked a large puddle into the bag. We tried to salvage it, but it had already spoiled. The second one hadn’t spoiled but didn’t taste very good. We will not be ordering OJ from Walmart again.
This is the second time I have ordered this item and it has been expired

reviews.title: Awful taste
reviews.review_text: Tastes so bad! Will not be buying this again. I'll spend the extra to pay for the name brand bc this just tastes awful.

I was very content with this orange juice, even though it did not have any pulp. The price was only $1.64 a couple of weeks ago; as of today, 09/19/2022, it has risen to $2.68. This is a $1.04 increase in two weeks.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: Im sure there is orange juice SOMEWHERE in the store. This is soooooo very disappointing. This happens often. What I order does not always show up at my door. Which is why I am going to switch to ALDI, through door dash.

I didn't like it they didn't have my size of something ordered and it had to be bigger,I would have to pay the price for the bigger.It use to be I could it for the same price of the original item I ordered.

reviews.title: Price Spike!
reviews.review_text: I’ve Been Buying GV OJ For The Longest. I Buy 2 Per Week. Today I Noticed That It Went From $2.00 To $3.38. I Will Buy Simply From Now On. The Price Spike Is Ridiculous. It’s Higher Then When The Pandemic Was At Peak! SMH!

reviews.title: OUTDATED PRODUCTS
reviews.review_text: The orange juice I received today will be outdated tomorrow. Pick up on Sept. 13, 2022. Orange juice is BEST BUY dated Sept. 13, 2022? Someone needs to pay more attention to the dates on your products.

reviews.title: Need check your freezer
reviews.review_text: Am weekly shopper, I noticed for the couple of times your milk and orange juice been bad way before expiration date. Like right I have some oj I brought 3 days ago, bad already. It's supposed expire on 7/26/2022.

reviews.title: Metal taste
reviews.review_text: Not good. Has metal tin taste. It came in plastic hard to open contsiner. Had to saw the lid off to get to thr juice then ended up poring it down the sink drain.

reviews.title: Misleading Label of ingredients--Contains ALLERGEN
reviews.review_text: The online website failed to update the ingredients list with new allergens not previously contained in this 64oz size OJ. This produce NOW contains traces of MILK, EGGS and SOY and I had a bad reaction! A few months ago, it was only the gallon sized OJ that had those allergens, but now it is ALSO the 64oz size!! I am so disappointed. I have a severe allergy to inhaled particles of soy and eggs--and a few minutes after I poured a glass of orange juice for my son, my throat began to get tight! I had to take an antihistamine quickly and open the window, and my husband had to take my son outside so he could drink the juice! So ridiculous. The price is a few pennies cheaper than other brands, and we are a lower-income family--so we picked this product and ordered it online. Sadly the ingredients label wasn't updated in the photos. I tookj a photo showing the new label contains these three serious allergens. I tried uploading it as a JPG 194 KB (well under the 5 MB max) and it failed, and then tried uploading as a PNG image (1.14 MB -- still well under the 5 MB max) and that failed as well. The website says there is a problem even though my pic is well under maximum of 5MB. I have tried uploading and re-creating this post in both my Chrome browser and in Microsof Edge Browser, but no option works for a successful upload, so that isn't fair either. But believe me there are REAL traces of these allergens in the product now, if anyone in your family is allergic to these allergens, then DON'T buy this product.

reviews.title: Pulp good. Fizz not good.
reviews.review_text: I selected GV Original OJ after deciding to try ready-made juice, i.e. not from concentrate. The first time I purchased this product (about four weeks ago), my husband shook and then opened the container. It bubbled up out of the bottle and made a mess, as if it was carbonated. When he sampled it, it was clearly distasteful, as if it had fermented and soured. This was despite opening it on the "Best By" date. We threw it out. Last week, I decided to give this product another try. The "Best By"date for the container I purchased is Sept. 16. (There is no year printed on the bottle, but I assumed it was for 2023.) When I opened the bottle, it made a slight fizzing sound, but the juice seemed fine. But over the next four days it became progressively more sour and seemingly carbonated. Again, we had to toss most of the OJ. I had thought that our first experience was a one-off. But when it happened a second time, I thought you should know. We will not be purchasing this product again. I'm not asking for a refund. I'm just giving you feedback.

reviews.title: Bad orange juice.
reviews.review_text: This orange juice (3) were too close to the expiring date. When I opened it, it tasted funny--like a biting taste--maybe fermented. The containers are all bulged! What is Walmart's problem lately? The other juice I had been buying was out of stock. That seems to be the normal at Walmart lately! At least they did refund my money. I guess I will need to buy my orange juice from Aldi from now on.

reviews.title: Not a good imitation of orange juice
reviews.review_text: The contents of this product trying to pass as orange juice should be labeled as unknown. The container builds up pressure as in outgassing, the smell is close to a vitamin chemical smell, nothing like orange, and the taste is like grapefruit juice that has been in an untreated metal container less the grapefruit. An after taste is also present of a metallic nature. My wife experienced the same from 2 containers.

reviews.title: Went bad long before expiration date
reviews.review_text: I used to buy one of these about every two weeks but the last 5 I have bought went bad long before the expiration date. I live close to the store so only a short trip home after buying and then straight into frig. so no excessive heat exposure on my end. The bottle swelled and it tasted like Grapefruit. I read that this is a sign that something went wrong at the Plant so I kept buying more hoping the next batch would be better but so far no luck.

reviews.title: fermented orange juice exploded, can't return it
reviews.review_text: i took one sip and it was fermented... i brought it to return and it exploded in my car, now it smells like gross fermented orange juice. I actually got pulled over for a wide turn on my way to return it, and the officer thought i had been drinking IT WAS SO BAD. i just ended up throwing the whole thing away. disgusting... i will never buy cold items from walmart grocery again... i can't even get my money back. how is it my fault YOUR PRODUCT WAS SPOILED AND NOW I HAVE TO BRING IT BACK???

reviews.title: Expired Products
reviews.review_text: We ordered orange juice it was delivered on 11/26. Today my husband noticed it expired on 11/18. I'm concerned that products aren't being checked for freshness expiration dates. This isn't the first time we have encountered issues with products from WalMart. I'm seriously considering not grocery shopping there anymore. I use delivery because it's convenient for my busy schedule Joleah Biellier

reviews.title: fermenting orange juice!!!
reviews.review_text: the orange juice i received had a funny smell to it. i dismissed it and continued to pour a cup. my oj was fizzing. i received this order april 7th and didn’t open it until april 14th. the exp date is april 22nd… why was my non opened orange juice already fermenting?? this is my 2nd time giving this brand a try but each time, the juice taste different. i wish i can upload this video of it!!

reviews.title: Vinegar Tasting OJ
reviews.review_text: This was given to me as a replacement for not having the gallon of the OJ with Calcium. I gave it to my daughter this morning and she immediately threw it up. She said, "Mom! Why does it taste like that?" I didn't have any so I had her bring me her glass. It smelled as though the OJ had vinegar in it. I don't know if it was a bad batch or what but I poured the whole half gallon down the drain. Next time they offer this as a replacement it will get turned away.

reviews.title: High quality orange juice at a good price
reviews.review_text: This is sweet and tasty orange juice that tastes like fresh squeezed orange juice from fresh oranges picked from a tree, and the price is really excellent. I buy and drink this orange juice all of the time because it is so good. The next time you buy orange juice, I would highly recommend giving Great Value 100% Orange Juice a try. You will not be disappointed. And the price of this Great Value orange juice is unbeatable.

reviews.title: Bad taste recently
reviews.review_text: I have purchased and enjoyed this juice for a long time, but the last two times, the juice did not taste right. It seemed very acidic. I could not drink it and had to throw it out. Thinking the first time was not representative, I purchased another one and it was the same way. Unless it is improved, I will not be using this any more!

This has such a weird awful taste that lingers. I'm not sure if it's too much pulp but I'm the least picky about OJ but I'll never be getting this again. Do yourself a favor and spend the extra .50 on something else. I was seriously concerned that something like paint thinner was in this.

First of all, the container was incredibly hard to open. I finally got the vice grips and that worked. I poured a small amount of juice in a glass then shook the container thoroughly. No matter how much i shook, juice was thin, watery and tasted so-so. Nothing special. Kroger brand is much better. This was my first time trying Equate orange juice and I won't buy it again.

reviews.title: Good juice!
reviews.review_text: I've bought this juice and the reviews are hate only, I have been drinking the juice with no problem! I grew up in a place where we grew oranges and we had always orange juice this juice tasted like very organic oranges, with zero sugars like others juices out there...

reviews.title: Sour Juice
reviews.review_text: This juice was SOUR I was unable to drink it. A waste of money.
I ordered orange juice in my pick up order on October 17 and the container said use by October 1

reviews.title: Complaint
reviews.review_text: The plastic container broke and was only able to save half the container, the rest was in the plastic bag
got my order and this expires in 3 days. the container was swollen up. the juice is no good and smells sour
Bought 2 cartons. Although not expired by 5 whole days the cartons were bulging and obviously not tight. They smelled very acrid. Threw them both out. Won't buy again.
Used to be delicious. Bought several times before and it was the best I've ever tasted. I think they changed something and now it doesn't taste as good, has a bad after taste.

reviews.title: If you want some good hydrate this will do it
reviews.review_text: This Stuff is Great ! It tastes heavenly ice cold. But even at almost room temp its still good. The size is perfect. Plenty for one person. You Could share but Drinking out of Bottle is Required on this.

reviews.title: Leaky but delicious
reviews.review_text: Tastes good, however the top can be very hard to open at times. Some are no issue, others you have to pry the ring from the lid. Also, don't store an opened container on the side, it will leak for some reason no matter how tight the lid is.

reviews.title: Tastes Great
reviews.review_text: I buy 2 every week and have never had any complaint. The taste is consistant from gal to gal. I stopped drinking Tropicana, bc it wasnt consistent. GV is sweet and reasonably priced.

reviews.title: Buyer Beware
reviews.review_text: I have never tasted sour orange juice but I purchased 2 jugs of this juice and they were bad and had spoiled. The jugs where continuing to bloat which is a indicator Walmart did not refrigerate this juice

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.review_text: This juice was sour, tart, and bitter. The expiration date seemed to be a good date. So im not sure what happened in store but this juice was horrible. Didn't know how to do a return and was too physically ill to do it in person!

reviews.title: Rancid oj
reviews.review_text: Rancid after only a couple of days. Still had a week left before it was supposedly due to expire. The one I bought a couple of weeks prior did the exact same thing. I had to throw out 3/4 of both containers.

reviews.title: Stomach ache
reviews.review_text: Three purchases in a row, the container started to expand like spoiled milk does, days before the sell by date, after only a day or two of use. Something is really off with these.

reviews.title: Short on item
reviews.review_text: I ordered 8 half gallon bottles of Great Value Orange Juice but received only 7. My credit card is being charge for 8 bottles. I am getting pretty discussed with Walmart charging for items not received.

reviews.title: great value 100% pure orange juise
reviews.review_text: I shop at Walmart often, I buy great value products often. Like every week when I go grocery shopping. But let me tell you, this orange juice that says 100% . It sucks. It taste like water with one orange . Its flavor leaves a bad taste in my mouth. So dissatisfied I poured the juice down the sink.. I hate to think this is the quality of Great Value and Walmart are coming to this. Many other stores and compared the prices very similar. To tell you the truth I think I will just stop grocery shopping there from now on.

reviews.title: Ad
reviews.review_text: Did curbside pick on 1/19/23. When I got home I looks at the expiration date which was 12/19/22. Month old. Tasted horrible

reviews.title: great value orange juice
reviews.review_text: what a value for the money would highly recommend it to others and reasonable price too would repurchase again
I bought this juice and it was expired and I had to throw it away make sure you guys check the dates ! It was march 23th

reviews.review_text: bought 2 half gallon great value orange juices thru the online app. both of them were sour. they had good dates but they are spoiled.
1 of the orange juice way bad. the date is still good. please refund the money to my account. thank you.
It taste like used plywood that's been laying out in the sun drying out after it's been soaked for a few days.
well it would have been nice if it wasnt past the expiration date its dated dec 27 i purchased it on jan 7th
Bought 2 days ago and just opened it and the juice was spoiled as heck! It was bad and the expired date said July 29th!

reviews.review_text: Could not open it even with pliers. I had to cut off the neck. Too bad. From now on I will buy Florida juice.

reviews.title: Pick a different brand.

reviews.title: Great Value products from Sam's %26 Walmart
reviews.review_text: It's made from concentrate. Reminds when buying the small concentrate cans and adding water to make orange juice. Tastes about the same. Prices have gone up a lot in the last couple years. Great Value products from Sam's %26 Walmart are usually the best deal when comparing and usually the same quality as name brand.

reviews.title: Spoiled Orange Juice
reviews.review_text: when I reached in a cooler to get a bottle of orange juice, multiple bottles fell out onto the floor. when I place them back into me cooler, I noticed that the bottles were swollen indicating spoilage. I took a bottle that wasn't swollen but the next day when I tasted it it also was spoiled.

reviews.title: My favorite OJ!
reviews.review_text: I loved this orange juice. I was impressed with it and have stopped buying other types. I always keep this in the fridge for my family. Even my husband will drink it, and he is very picky! It tastes awesome! I have had such good luck with the Great Value brand.

reviews.title: truly awful addition
reviews.review_text: this stuff is truly awful. this is a recent addition to my local store. bought it since the GV carton is no longer available. i figured it's the same stuff. i had half a glass, poured out the glass. tastes so bad - understatement. i tried it again different day - poured out the container. the recycling of the plastic was the highlight of my purchase.

reviews.title: Bad Taste
reviews.review_text: This is able to be purchased with WIC items; however, it always has a sour taste to it, almost Like a chemical taste. It's never expired, I've bought it 3 different times, yet it has the same chemically sour taste EvErY TiMe. I don't believe it's 100% oJ. I even Let my mom and another adult family member taste it, and they noticed the same thing about this Great Value orange juice. My children dislike it also. I wanted to do the money-back guarantee, but I'm not able to find it on the site, unfortunately.

reviews.title: Great for the price
reviews.review_text: Surprisingly good taste for the price.

reviews.title: Great juice
reviews.review_text: We like this orange juice, we but 1 or 2 each week. You don't need to shake it before using. We use it in fruit smoothies too. Others must like it too,because sometimes the store runs out. So we shop early before it's gone .

reviews.title: Great Value at a great price.
reviews.review_text: With a growing boy, Walmart once again has come through by helping me to stretch every dollar in offering another great product at a highly reasonable price. My son loves GV Orange Juice and so do I, it completes our morning breakfast routines.

reviews.title: Really good Orange juice
reviews.review_text: This orange juice surprised me I have to say. It’s really good. I don’t drink juice much. I would buy this again and that’s saying a lot for me. It’s not to sweet and it’s refreshing. Has no strange aftertaste either.

reviews.title: Taste yummy
reviews.review_text: Taste delicious and the quality is affordable! Just be sure to shake it really good because it is concentrated orange juice with water added. Next time you want to grab a fountain drink grab one of these instead. Natures energy in a bottle.

reviews.title: Leaking bottle of orange juice
reviews.review_text: One of the bottles of great value orange juice was leaking. About an inch of juice was missing and I got juice all over the floor when I pulled it out of the bag.

reviews.title: Horrible Taste
reviews.review_text: This orange juice is horrible and the taste is not very good like it taste sour. If i were you i drink the tropicana orange juice or the GV orange juice in carton.
I was surprised that this oj doesn’t make me have upset stomach. I’ve been unable to drink OJ for years but this one is not aggressive to my stomach and the flavor is very tasty LOVE IT

reviews.title: Orange Juice
reviews.review_text: Our family drinks a lot of orange juice. The price allows me to be generous in providing the children with good nutrition.

reviews.title: Says 100% Orange Juice - FALSE
reviews.review_text: "100% Orange Juice"? Just read the first ingredient folks, it's "Filtered Water" Not 100% orange juice. BLATANTLY MISLEADING FALSE ADVERTISING.
Very good quality and best value for your money. I used to buy Tropicana in the past but Great Value is way better.
